title: The Problem with San Diego Comic-Con: A Conversation with Colin
description:
Everyone likes Comic-Con, right? Wrong. Meet Colin Moriarty.

Today's topic was submitted by the handsome man @CraigBeridon. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.

Follow us on Twitter
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/notaxation

#AConversationWithColin Playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL85130F65C312F61E&feature=plcp

Huge thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

transcript_chunks.text: you want to go to the panels hear about the next season or whatever is coming up Big Bang Theory definitely oh my God I'd rather kill myself than see a Big Bang Theory panel to be for honest with you Greg what's up everybody Welcome to a conversation with Colin I'm Greg and this is my roommate Colin now sometimes Colin says crazy stuff so every Tuesday and Thursday I reach to my random topic pile pull one out toss it at them we talk it out for your amusement if you like that subscribe to the channel like the video share it with your friends so we keep on growing Colin are you ready yes today's toic of conversation is San Diego ComiCon submitted by at Craig baradon San Diego Comic how do you feel about that there ComicCon you've gone you've presented I have I was you did the Resistance panel I did a resistance three panel there why that game sold no copies yeah no one gave a a [ __ ] about me doing that panel what do you think about ComiCon what you don't go to ComiCon I go every year I

I did a resistance three panel there why that game sold no copies yeah no one gave a a [ __ ] about me doing that panel what do you think about ComiCon what you don't go to ComiCon I go every year I go out of my way to go no I don't really like ComiCon why don't you like Comic-Con all right so San Diego Comic-Con is kind of like its own Beast right like it's it's in the middle of the summer right on Hell on Earth in San Diego why is it cuz it's so hot yeah San dieg is a beautiful city it's hot as hell like I don't understand why people why does that have to take place like it's in August right or July it's July like why does it have to take place in the middle of the summer everybody's off school you can go there you can party you can hang out have Comic-Con friends it is so hot like I went there I couldn't wait to not be you were there for like what four hours I was there for a half a day yeah and I like couldn't wait to not be at San Diego Comic-Con anymore well it's cuz you wore a
